source_sentence: 佛三身讚(西土賢聖撰)
translation: Buddha's Praise of the Three Bodies (compiled by Xianzheong of the Western Regions)

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝散大夫試光祿
translation: Xitian zhuan jing sanzang朝散 dafu xingguang lu

source_sentence: 卿明教大師臣法賢奉　詔譯
translation: Qingmingjiao daishi jing faxian Feng imperial edict translation

source_sentence: 法身
translation: Dharma body

source_sentence: 我今稽首法身佛　　無喻難思普遍智
translation: I now bow my head in homage to the Buddha Dharma body, which is without parallel and incomprehensible universal wisdom.

source_sentence: 充滿法界無罣礙　　湛然寂靜無等等
translation: It fills the cosmos without obstruction, being tranquil and unequaled.

source_sentence: 非有非無性真實　　亦非多少離數量
translation: It is neither existent nor nonexistent and true, neither finite nor infinite.

source_sentence: 平等無相若虛空　　福利自他亦如是
translation: As space is the equality and signlessness of all things, so is self-benefiting and benefiting others.

source_sentence: 報身
translation: body as retribution

source_sentence: 我今稽首報身佛　　湛然安住大牟尼
translation: I now bow my head in homage to the Tathāgata reward-body, who lives peacefully in the great samādhi

source_sentence: 哀愍化度菩薩眾　　處會如日而普照
translation: He had compassion for all the bodhisattvas who were liberated, and his ray of light shone everywhere like the sun.

source_sentence: 三祇積集諸功德　　始能圓滿寂靜道
translation: Only after accumulating the merits accumulated in the past three aeons can he perfect the path of tranquility

source_sentence: 以大音聲談妙法　　普令獲得平等果
translation: and of the realization of equanimity, consummated by listening to the Teaching with great reverence.

source_sentence: 化身
translation: transformation body

source_sentence: 我今稽首化身佛　　菩提樹下成正覺
translation: I now bow my head in homage to the Tathāgata Mahākāśyapa, who has attained buddhahood at the foot of the bodhi tree.

source_sentence: 或起變現或寂靜　　或復往化於十方
translation: He may follow the ways of all living beings, or he may follow the ways of liberation.

source_sentence: 或轉法輪於鹿苑　　或現大光如火聚
translation: He may turn the wheel of the Law in the Deer Park, or he may show great light like a cluster of flames.

source_sentence: 三塗苦報悉能除　　三界無比大牟尼
translation: Great Sage who is able to remove the three coarse retributions of suffering from the three realms

source_sentence: 迴向
translation: dedication of merit

source_sentence: 如是佛身無漏智　　我常信解淨三業
以無量慧大福行　　一心垂愍諸群生
translation: of the great store of virtue which is without measure, consummated in wisdom;

source_sentence: 以今頌讚三身佛　　所獲無漏功德種
translation: of the seeds of virtue which are pure and genuine, belonging to all living beings;

source_sentence: 願我速證佛菩提　　盡引眾生歸正道
translation: May I quickly attain enlightenment, leading all living beings to the path!

source_sentence: 佛三身讚
translation: Buddha's praise of the three bodies
